metadata.title: CVE-2024-26919 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:ulpi: Fix debugfs directory leak The ULPI per-device debugfs root is namedafter the ulpi device's parent, but ulpi_unregister_interface tries toremove a debugfs directory named after the ulpi device itself. This resultsin the directory sticking around and preventing subsequent (deferred)probes from succeeding. Change the directory name to match the ulpi device.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
